title: 水桶服被禁止放置TNT，如何改回允许放置？
author: wolski
txt_content: 服务器里装了Essentials GroupManager SafeExplosions ，实在找不出该修改哪里 {:10_522:}

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 strawmaine 于 2012-8-20 11:59 编辑 

\plugins\Essentials\config.yml
较高级的文本编辑器打开

############################################################
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
# |                 EssentialsProtect                    | #
# +------------------------------------------------------+ #
############################################################

protect:
  # Database settings for sign/rail protection

  # mysql or sqlite
  # We strongly recommend against using mysql here, unless you have a good reason.
  # Sqlite seems to be faster in almost all cases, and in some cases mysql can be much slower.
  datatype: 'sqlite'

  # If you specified MySQL above, you MUST enter the appropriate details here.
  # If you specified SQLite above, these will be IGNORED.
  username: 'root'
  password: 'root'
  mysqlDb: 'jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/minecraft'

  # For which block types would you like to be alerted?
  # You can find a list of IDs in plugins/Essentials/items.csv after loading Essentials for the first time.
  # 10 = lava :: 11 = still lava :: 46 = TNT :: 327 = lava bucket
  alert:
    on-placement: 10,11,46,327
    on-use: 327
    on-break: 

  blacklist:

    # Which blocks should people be prevented from placing
    placement: 10,11,46,327             删掉 “46, “ 

    # Which items should people be prevented from using
    usage: 327

    # Which blocks should people be prevented from breaking
    break:

    # Which blocks should not be pushed by pistons
    piston:
